title: Five letters concerning the inspiration of the Holy Scriptures translated out of French.
author: Le Clerc, Jean, 1657-1736.
notes: Selections from two separate titles, Défense des Sentimens de quelques théologiens de Hollande sur l'Histoire critique du Vieux Testament, and Sentimens de quelques théologiens
Written by Jean Le Clerc. Translation attributed to John Locke. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Title page is missing in the filmed copy. Beginning-page 27 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
